name: Simple Marinated Chicken Wings
author: ginag
summary: These are my husband's favorite kind of wings.  Easy to make and delicious. They taste even better if you double the sauce and marinate for 24 hours.
directions: Whisk together the soy sauce, brown sugar, sherry, mustard, and garlic powder in a bowl
Arrange the chicken wings in a 9x13-inch baking dish, and pour marinade over the chicken
Cover the baking dish with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours
Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Remove the plastic wrap from the baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken wings are no longer pink in the center, about 1 hour, basting occasionally
